column6:
What's green and scaly and likes parading around New York City in big purple underpants? You guessed it...FIN FANG FOOM! Will Spidey figure out how to put the kibosh on the devilish dragon, or will he be...squished?,2006,9
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | writer:Peter David | inker:Norman Lee | penciller:Mike Norton | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller (cover):Cameron Stewart
